name: nHIa
title: globalCompositeOperation の blending のテスト
description:
globalCompositeOperation で blending が使える

Firefox は OK, Chrome は canary のみ (2013/5/24)

update Chrome dev 29 でも使えるように (2013/5/26)

js.content:
$ = (id) -> document.getElementById id

ctx = $('canv').getContext '2d'
img = document.createElement 'img'
img.src = '../assets/GAVxv.jpg'

grad = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, 256, 0)
for color, i in 'red|yellow|lime|cyan|blue|pink|red'.split '|'
    grad.addColorStop(i / 6, color)
ctx.fillStyle = grad

draw = (gco) ->
    ctx.clearRect(0, 0, 256, 384)
    ctx.globalCompositeOperation = 'source-over'
    ctx.drawImage(img, 0, 0)
    ctx.globalCompositeOperation = gco
    ctx.fillRect(0, 128, 256, 384)
    
img.onload = -> draw 'source-over'
$('blendmodes').addEventListener 'click', (e) ->
    draw e.target.textContent
, false
